text: The nominations are in! On September 5, E! News unveiled the list of nominees for the 2018 People's Choice Awards. There are 43 award categories this year, so a ton of your favorite shows and celebs will be going for the gold. You can see every single nominee here, but first things first : We know you're curious which Bravo shows and Bravolebrities will be at the at the star - studded ceremony on November 11. So, here goes! In the ` ` Reality Show of 2018'' category, The Real Housewives of Atlanta and The Real Housewives of New York City are both nominated ; so is Vanderpump Rules.
